nodes.text: Nektods were small pod-creatures that formed on the sides of starships and could survive in the vacuum of space. When marinated and roasted slowly, they could be turned into a snack. While traveling to a meeting of the New Republic Senate on the planet Nakadia, Senator Tolwar Wartol offered Chancellor Mon Mothma Nektods to eat.
Nektods first appeared in the Chuck Wendig's 2017 novel Aftermath: Empire's End.
